Info.Info:
Version 3.3.71 is available.
Replaced icons still using the old style Added a dialog asking for feedback about GD Fixed typos. Fixed proper frame for sprite objects not always shown if animation was paused. Fixed initial value of texts objects not always properly shown in HTML5 games. HTML5 games physics engine is now Box2d.js (for better performances). Fixed Time expression for HTML5 games. Fixed error when the parsed JSON was not correct for HTML5 games. Fixed Random expression for HTML5 games. Fixed crashs (with scrollbars for example).

CommunityNews.text:
**Crowdfunding campaign for Game Develop!**
Help us bring GD to Mac OS, improve the Ubuntu version and support iOS and Android for HTML5 games! As a contributor you'll be given access to beta versions and help accelerating the development of new features!
CommunityNews.linkLabel1: Visit the Indiegogo page for Game Develop!
